document_api_meta.title: Get Open Collaboration Product List By Product Ids
document_api_meta.env_desc: Get Product OpenCollaboration Product List By Product Ids

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The creator access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 1. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a362dccb8030ea6f98c) to get creator access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^products
response_param.desc: These are the searched products.

response_param.name: ^^shop
response_param.desc: The product's shop information.

response_param.name: ^^^name
response_param.desc: The name of the shop to which the product belongs.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: Product's unique id.

response_param.name: ^^has_inventory
response_param.desc: Whether this product has inventory.

response_param.name: ^^units_sold
response_param.desc: The total sales of this product.

response_param.name: ^^title
response_param.desc: Product's name.

response_param.name: ^^sale_region
response_param.desc: The region represents the areas where the product can be sold.

response_param.name: ^^main_image_url
response_param.desc: The product image url.

response_param.name: ^^detail_link
response_param.desc: Product's detail link which is used to get product details on mobile clients.

response_param.name: ^^original_price
response_param.desc: The product's original price

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency in the sale region.

response_param.name: ^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The minimum original price of all skus of this product.

response_param.name: ^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The maximum original price of all skus of this product.

response_param.name: ^^category_chains
response_param.desc:
The categories of this product.
Return to the top three categories at most

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The current category id of this product.

response_param.name: ^^^local_name
response_param.desc: The current level category name of this product.

response_param.name: ^^^is_leaf
response_param.desc: Indicate whether current node is leaf node

response_param.name: ^^^parent_id
response_param.desc: The category id of its parent category

response_param.name: ^^commission
response_param.desc: The commission of this product.

response_param.name: ^^^rate
response_param.desc:
- The commission rate for this product is set by merchants for creators public promotion.
- The range of this value is [100, 8000].
- This value equals actual commission rate multi 10000. For example: 3000 means the actual commission rate is 30.00%, and 3555 means 35.55%

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: Currency symbol

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc:
The commission for this product is calculated by multiplying the promotional price with the commission rate for each promotional order.
The currency symbol is same as the currency symbol in price

response_param.name: ^^sales_price
response_param.desc: Sales price information of the product

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: Currency symbol for sales area

response_param.name: ^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The  minimum promotion price of all skus of this product.

response_param.name: ^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The maximum promotion price of all skus of this product.

response_param.name: ^^shop_ads_commission
response_param.desc:
The ads commission rate applies only to orders generated from ads. If a creator’s video is used as an ad without this rate being set, the resulting orders will instead earn either:
- The Shop Ads commission you configured in open collaboration, or
- The standard commission defined in this invitation.

response_param.name: ^^^rate
response_param.desc:
- The commission rate for this product is set by merchants for creators public promotion.
- The range of this value is [100, 8000].
- This value equals actual commission rate multi 10000. For example: 3000 means the actual commission rate is 30.00%, and 3555 means 35.55%

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to get details regarding your collaborations, including searching collaborations, tracking collaboration performance, receiving collaboration detaiIs and updates, and querying sample applications and related fulfillment details.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to get your collaborations, including getting the collaboration, searching collaborations, tracking collaboration performance, receiving collaboration updates, and getting sample distribution.
